Feedback Contact us Terms of use Powered by SEEDS Sign Out Hello blank fragment Results Congratulations Loading...!! Mcq Activity Match these statements to following answers. "One of the models for intercultural competence (Bennett) can be applied as a simple checklist of four steps, trying to move away from ethnocentrism towards an understanding some of the ways in which other cultures are similar to and different from our own. We emphasize adapting behavior in response to differing cultural contexts and reconciling cultural differences in order to learn or create value from cross-cultural interactions. " Four steps to intercultural awareness Activity 2: What´s the comment about? The adjustment to an unfamiliar situation or culture can be hard. There is some time of uncertainty and, in some cases, anxiety. We need to deal with ambiguity and new norms, ways to communicate/ behave. Some people go through similar phases during that time of adjustment. Can you connect these people´s comment to the description of the stage they´re at? //Headings Learning Application Chatbot Exercises and download materials Activities
//Description WELCOME LET\'S GO Skip SEEDS is a project for supporting learning and education on the fringe of the digital sphere. Due to the lack of access to educational institutions and little or no equipment (Tablets, or Laptops and PCs) with necessary digital technologies, young people found it difficult to follow classes. ICT and above all the smartphone can be used here to mitigate this deficit. The needs and challenges of the target group must be taken into account (i.e. no up-to-date smartphones with outdated software). Our idea is to communicate learning content to vulnerable people in a new way by using chat bots. Already an User? Login here. Create Account
